Advanced Battle Dress

Heavy armor for marines deployed in high combat offworld engagements.

NOTE: Includes short-range comms, body cam, headlamp, HUD, exoskeleton weave ([+] on Strength Checks), and radiation shielding. Ignores the first Wound you suffer.
